body:
# compe library for crystal

[![Actions Status](https://github.com/ngng628/compe-library.cr/workflows/verify/badge.svg)](https://github.com/ngng628/compe-library.cr/actions) 
[![GitHub Pages](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=GitHub+Pages&message=+&color=brightgreen&logo=github)](https://ngng628.github.io/compe-library.cr/)
[![License: CC0-1.0](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-CC0_1.0-lightgrey.svg)](http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/)



## これはなに？
競技プログラミング用の Crystal ライブラリです。

[google/ac-library.cr](https://github.com/google/ac-library.cr) に依存しています。


## Link

**Verify** : [https://ngng628.github.io/compe-library.cr/docs](https://ngng628.github.io/compe-library.cr/docs)

**API Reference** : [https://ngng628.github.io/compe-library.cr/api](https://ngng628.github.io/compe-library.cr/api)

types.name: Char
types.doc:
A `Char` represents a [Unicode](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicode) [code point](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Code_point).
It occupies 32 bits.

It is created by enclosing an UTF-8 character in single quotes.

```
'a'
'z'
'0'
'_'
'あ'
```

You can use a backslash to denote some characters:

```
'\'' # single quote
'\\' # backslash
'\e' # escape
'\f' # form feed
'\n' # newline
'\r' # carriage return
'\t' # tab
'\v' # vertical tab
```

You can use a backslash followed by an *u* and four hexadecimal characters to denote a unicode codepoint written:

```
'\u0041' # == 'A'
```

Or you can use curly braces and specify up to four hexadecimal numbers:

```
'\u{41}' # == 'A'
```

See [`Char` literals](https://crystal-lang.org/reference/syntax_and_semantics/literals/char.html) in the language reference.

types.name: Int
types.doc:
Int is the base type of all integer types.

There are four signed integer types: `Int8`, `Int16`, `Int32` and `Int64`,
being able to represent numbers of 8, 16, 32 and 64 bits respectively.
There are four unsigned integer types: `UInt8`, `UInt16`, `UInt32` and `UInt64`.

An integer literal is an optional `+` or `-` sign, followed by
a sequence of digits and underscores, optionally followed by a suffix.
If no suffix is present, the literal's type is `Int32`, or `Int64` if the
number doesn't fit into an `Int32`:

```
1 # Int32

1_i8  # Int8
1_i16 # Int16
1_i32 # Int32
1_i64 # Int64

1_u8  # UInt8
1_u16 # UInt16
1_u32 # UInt32
1_u64 # UInt64

+10 # Int32
-20 # Int32

2147483648 # Int64
```

Literals without a suffix that are larger than `Int64::MAX` represent a
`UInt64` if the number fits, e.g. `9223372036854775808` and
`0x80000000_00000000`. This behavior is deprecated and will become an error in
the future.

The underscore `_` before the suffix is optional.

Underscores can be used to make some numbers more readable:

```
1_000_000 # better than 1000000
```

Binary numbers start with `0b`:

```
0b1101 # == 13
```

Octal numbers start with `0o`:

```
0o123 # == 83
```

Hexadecimal numbers start with `0x`:

```
0xFE012D # == 16646445
0xfe012d # == 16646445
```

See [`Integer` literals](https://crystal-lang.org/reference/syntax_and_semantics/literals/integers.html) in the language reference.
types.summary: Int is the base type of all integer types.

constructors.name: new
constructors.doc:
$n$ 頂点 $0$ 辺からなるグラフを作成します。

```
graph = BfsGraph.new(n)
```
constructors.summary: $n$ 頂点 $0$ 辺からなるグラフを作成します。

instance_methods.name: add_edge
instance_methods.doc:
辺 $(u, v)$ を追加します。

`directed` が `true` の場合、
有向グラフとみなして、$u$ から $v$ への辺のみ生やします。

```
graph = BfsGraph.new(n)
graph.add_edge(u, v)                 # => (u) <---w---> (v)
graph.add_edge(u, v, directed: true) # => (u) ----w---> (v)
```
instance_methods.summary: 辺 $(u, v)$ を追加します。
instance_methods.args_string: (u : Int, v : Int, directed : Bool = false)
instance_methods.args_html: (u : Int, v : Int, directed : Bool = false)

def.name: add_edge

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
始点 `start` から終点 `dest` への最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = graph.shortest_path(start: 2, dest: 0)
dist # => 12
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 start から終点 dest への最短経路長を返します。

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
始点 `start` から各頂点への最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = graph.shortest_path(start: 2)
dist # => [3, 8, 0, 7, 1]
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 start から各頂点への最短経路長を返します。

def.name: shortest_path
def.body:
queue = Deque.new([start.to_i32])
dist = Array.new(@size) do |i|
  i == start ? 0_i64 : OO
end
while !queue.empty?
  from = queue.shift
  @graph[from].each do |to|
    if dist[to] != OO
      next
    end
    dist[to] = dist[from] + 1
    queue << to
  end
end
dist

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
全点対間の最短経路長を返します。

```
dists = graph.shortest_path
dists # => [[0, 1, 3], [1, 0, 2], [1, 1, 0]]
```
instance_methods.summary: 全点対間の最短経路長を返します。

constructors.name: new
constructors.doc:
$n$ 頂点 $0$ 辺からなるグラフを作成します。

```
graph = Dijkstra.new(n)
```
constructors.summary: $n$ 頂点 $0$ 辺からなるグラフを作成します。

instance_methods.name: add_edge
instance_methods.doc:
非負整数の重み $w$ の辺 $(u, v)$ を追加します。

`directed` が `true` の場合、
有向グラフとみなして、$u$ から $v$ への辺のみ生やします。

```
graph = Dijkstra.new(n)
graph.add_edge(u, v, w)                 # => (u) <---w---> (v)
graph.add_edge(u, v, w, directed: true) # => (u) ----w---> (v)
```
instance_methods.summary: 非負整数の重み $w$ の辺 $(u, v)$ を追加します。
instance_methods.args_string: (u : Int, v : Int, w : Int, directed : Bool = false)
instance_methods.args_html: (u : Int, v : Int, w : Int, directed : Bool = false)

def.name: add_edge

instance_methods.name: add_edge
instance_methods.doc:
非負整数の重み $w$ の辺 $(u, v)$ を追加します。

`directed` が `true` の場合、
有効グラフとみなして、$u$ から $v$ への辺のみ生やします。

```
graph = Dijkstra.new(n)
graph.add_edge(u, v, w)                 # => (u) <---w---> (v)
graph.add_edge(u, v, w, directed: true) # => (u) ----w---> (v)
```
instance_methods.summary: 非負整数の重み $w$ の辺 $(u, v)$ を追加します。
instance_methods.args_string: (u : Int, v : Int, w : Weight, directed : Bool = false)
instance_methods.args_html: (u : Int, v : Int, w : Weight, directed : Bool = false)

def.name: add_edge

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
始点 `start` から終点 `dest` への最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = graph.shortest_path(start: 2, dest: 0)
dist # => 12
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 start から終点 dest への最短経路長を返します。

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
始点 `start` から各頂点への最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = graph.shortest_path(2)
dist # => [3, 8, 0, 7, 1]
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 start から各頂点への最短経路長を返します。

def.name: shortest_path
def.body:
dist = [OO] * @size
dist[start] = 0_i64
next_node = RadixHeap64(Int32).new
next_node.push(0_u64, start.to_i32)
while !next_node.empty?
  d, source = next_node.pop
  if dist[source] < d
    next
  end
  @graph[source].each do |e|
    next_cost = dist[source] + e.weight
    if next_cost < dist[e.target]
      dist[e.target] = next_cost
      next_node.push(next_cost.to_u64, e.target)
    end
  end
end
dist

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
全点対間の最短経路長を返します。

```
dists = graph.shortest_path
dists # => [[0, 1, 3], [1, 0, 2], [1, 1, 0]]
```
instance_methods.summary: 全点対間の最短経路長を返します。

instance_methods.name: shortest_path_route
instance_methods.doc:
始点 `start` から終点 `dest` への最短経路の一例を返します。

```
route = graph.shortest_path_route(start: 2, dest: 0)
route # => [2, 7, 1, 0]
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 start から終点 dest への最短経路の一例を返します。

def.name: shortest_path_route
def.body:
prev = impl_memo_route(start)
res = Array(Int32).new
now : Int32 | ::Nil = dest.to_i32
while !now.nil?
  res << now.not_nil!
  now = prev[now]
end
res.reverse

instance_methods.name: shortest_path_tree
instance_methods.doc:
始点 `start` から最短路木を構築します。

最短路木は `start` からの最短経路のみを残した全域木です。

```
route = graph.shortest_path_route(start: 2, dest: 0)
route # => [2, 7, 1, 0]
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 start から最短路木を構築します。

def.name: shortest_path_tree
def.body:
dist = [OO] * @size
dist[start] = 0_i64
next_node = RadixHeap64(Int32).new
next_node.push(0_u64, start.to_i32)
birth = [-1] * @size
while !next_node.empty?
  d, source = next_node.pop
  if dist[source] < d
    next
  end
  @graph[source].each do |e|
    next_cost = dist[source] + e.weight
    if next_cost < dist[e.target]
      dist[e.target] = next_cost
      next_node.push(next_cost.to_u64, e.target)
      birth[e.target] = source
    end
  end
end
tree = Array.new(@size) do
  [] of Int32
end
@size.times do |target|
  source = birth[target]
  if source == -1
    next
  end
  tree[source] << target
  if directed
  else
    tree[target] << source
  end
end
tree

constants.name: DYDX8
constants.value: [UP, add(UP, RIGHT), RIGHT, add(DOWN, RIGHT), DOWN, add(DOWN, LEFT), LEFT, add(UP, LEFT)]

class_methods.name: add
class_methods.args_html: (v1 : Tuple(Int, Int), v2 : Tuple(Int, Int))

class_methods.name: sub
class_methods.args_html: (v1 : Tuple(Int, Int), v2 : Tuple(Int, Int))

instance_methods.name: barred?
instance_methods.doc:
位置 $(y, x)$ が進入禁止なら `true` を返します。

```
..
.#

grid.barrd?(0, 0) # => false
grid.barrd?(1, 1) # => true
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 $(y, x)$ が進入禁止なら true を返します。

instance_methods.name: barred?
instance_methods.doc:
位置 `pos` が進入禁止なら `true` を返します。

```
..
.#

grid.barrd?({0, 0}) # => false
grid.barrd?({1, 1}) # => true
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 pos が進入禁止なら true を返します。

instance_methods.name: each
instance_methods.doc: Must yield this collection's elements to the block.
instance_methods.summary: Must yield this collection's elements to the block.

def.name: each
def.body:
i = 0
while i < h
  j = 0
  while j < w
    yield self[i, j]
    j = j + 1
  end
  i = i + 1
end

instance_methods.name: each_neighbor
instance_methods.doc:
位置 $(y, x)$ の近傍で、侵入可能な位置を列挙します。

```
grid = Grid.dydx([".#.", "...", "...")

grid.each_neighbor(1, 1) do |ny, nx|
end
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 $(y, x)$ の近傍で、侵入可能な位置を列挙します。

def.name: each_neighbor
def.body:
i = 0
while i < @delta.size
  ny = y + @delta[i][0]
  nx = x + @delta[i][1]
  if free?(ny, nx)
    yield ny, nx
  end
  i = i + 1
end

instance_methods.name: each_neighbor_with_direction
instance_methods.doc:
位置 $(y, x)$ の近傍で、侵入可能な位置を方向とともに列挙します。

```
grid = Grid.dydx([".#.", "...", "...")

grid.each_neighbor(1, 1) do |ny, nx, dir|
end
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 $(y, x)$ の近傍で、侵入可能な位置を方向とともに列挙します。

def.name: each_neighbor_with_direction
def.body:
i = 0
while i < @delta.size
  ny = y + @delta[i][0]
  nx = x + @delta[i][1]
  if free?(ny, nx)
    yield ny, nx, i
  end
  i = i + 1
end

instance_methods.name: each_with_index
instance_methods.doc:
Iterates over the collection, yielding both the elements and their index.

```
["Alice", "Bob"].each_with_index do |user, i|
  puts "User ##{i}: #{user}"
end
```

Prints:

```text
User # 0: Alice
User # 1: Bob
```

Accepts an optional *offset* parameter, which tells it to start counting
from there. So, a more human friendly version of the previous snippet would be:

```
["Alice", "Bob"].each_with_index(1) do |user, i|
  puts "User ##{i}: #{user}"
end
```

Which would print:

```text
User # 1: Alice
User # 2: Bob
```
instance_methods.summary: Iterates over the collection, yielding both the elements and their index.

def.name: each_with_index
def.body:
i = 0
while i < h
  j = 0
  while j < w
    yield self[i, j], {i, j}
    j = j + 1
  end
  i = i + 1
end

instance_methods.name: free?
instance_methods.doc:
位置 $(y, x)$ が通行可能なら `true` を返します。

```
..
.#

grid.free?(0, 0) # => true
grid.free?(1, 1) # => false
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 $(y, x)$ が通行可能なら true を返します。

instance_methods.name: free?
instance_methods.doc:
位置 `pos` が通行可能なら `true` を返します。

```
..
.#

grid.free?({0, 0}) # => true
grid.free?({1, 1}) # => false
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 pos が通行可能なら true を返します。

instance_methods.name: index
instance_methods.doc:
Returns the index of the first element for which the passed block is truthy.

```
["Alice", "Bob"].index { |name| name.size < 4 } # => 1 (Bob's index)
```

Returns `nil` if the block is not truthy for any element.
instance_methods.summary: Returns the index of the first element for which the passed block is truthy.

def.name: index
def.body:
each_with_index do |c, __arg0|
  i = __arg0[0]
  j = __arg0[1]
  if yield c
    return {i, j}
  end
end
nil

instance_methods.name: index
instance_methods.doc:
Returns the first index of *obj* in the collection.

```
["Alice", "Bob"].index("Alice") # => 0
```

Returns `nil` if *obj* is not in the collection.
instance_methods.summary: Returns the first index of obj in the collection.

instance_methods.name: index!
instance_methods.doc:
Returns the index of the first element for which the passed block is truthy.

```
["Alice", "Bob"].index! { |name| name.size < 4 } # => 1 (Bob's index)
```

Raises `Enumerable::NotFoundError` if there is no element for which the block is truthy.
instance_methods.summary: Returns the index of the first element for which the passed block is truthy.

def.name: index!

instance_methods.name: index!
instance_methods.doc:
Returns the first index of *obj* in the collection.

```
["Alice", "Bob"].index!("Alice") # => 0
```

Raises `Enumerable::NotFoundError` if *obj* is not in the collection.
instance_methods.summary: Returns the first index of obj in the collection.

instance_methods.name: over?
instance_methods.doc:
位置 $(y, x)$ がグリッドの範囲外なら `true` を返します。

```
grid.over?(-1, 0)          # => true
grid.over?(h + 10, w + 10) # => true
grid.over?(0, 0)           # => false
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 $(y, x)$ がグリッドの範囲外なら true を返します。

instance_methods.name: over?
instance_methods.doc:
位置 `pos` がグリッドの範囲外なら `true` を返します。

```
grid.over?({-1, 0})          # => true
grid.over?({h + 10, w + 10}) # => true
grid.over?({0, 0})           # => false
```
instance_methods.summary: 位置 pos がグリッドの範囲外なら true を返します。

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
始点 $(si, sj)$ から終点 $(gi, gj)$ への最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = grid.shortest_path(start: {si, sj})
dist[gi][gj] # => 4
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 $(si, sj)$ から終点 $(gi, gj)$ への最短経路長を返します。

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
始点 $(si, sj)$ から各マスへの最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = grid.shortest_path(start: {si, sj})
dist[gi][gj] # => 4
```
instance_methods.summary: 始点 $(si, sj)$ から各マスへの最短経路長を返します。

def.name: shortest_path
def.body:
queue = Deque.new([start])
dist = Array.new(@h) do
  Array.new(@w) do
    OO
  end
end
dist[start[0]][start[1]] = 0
while !queue.empty?
  i, j = queue.shift
  each_neighbor(i, j) do |ni, nj|
    if dist[ni][nj] != OO
      next
    end
    dist[ni][nj] = dist[i][j] + 1
    queue << {ni, nj}
  end
end
dist

instance_methods.name: shortest_path
instance_methods.doc:
全マス間の最短経路長を返します。

```
dist = grid.shortest_path
dist[si][sj][gi][gj] # => 4
```
instance_methods.summary: 全マス間の最短経路長を返します。

def.name: shortest_path
def.body:
Array.new(@h) do |si|
  Array.new(@w) do |sj|
    shortest_path(si, sj)
  end
end

instance_methods.name: to_a
instance_methods.doc:
Returns an `Array` with all the elements in the collection.

```
(1..5).to_a # => [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
```
instance_methods.summary: Returns an Array with all the elements in the collection.

def.name: to_a
def.body:
a = Array.new(@h) do
  Array(T).new(@w)
end
@h.times do |i|
  @w.times do |j|
    a[i] << self[i, j]
  end
end
a

instance_methods.name: to_s
instance_methods.doc:
Appends a short String representation of this object
which includes its class name and its object address.

```
class Person
  def initialize(@name : String, @age : Int32)
  end
end

Person.new("John", 32).to_s # => #<Person:0x10a199f20>
```
instance_methods.summary: Appends a short String representation of this object which includes its class name and its object address.

def.name: to_s
def.body:
@h.times do |i|
  @w.times do |j|
    if j != 0
      io << ' '
    end
    io << self[i, j]
  end
  io << '\n'
end
io

constructors.name: new
constructors.doc: 木構造グラフ `graph` に対して、`root` を根とする LCA を構築します。
constructors.summary: 木構造グラフ graph に対して、root を根とする LCA を構築します。

instance_methods.name: ancestor
instance_methods.doc: 頂点 $u$ と 頂点 $v$ の最近共通祖先を返します。
instance_methods.summary: 頂点 $u$ と 頂点 $v$ の最近共通祖先を返します。

def.name: ancestor
def.body:
if @dist[u] < @dist[v]
  u, v = v, u
end
n = @parent.size
n.times do |k|
  if ((dist[u] - dist[v]).bit(k)) == 1
    u = @parent[k][u]
  end
end
if u == v
  return u
end
(n - 1).downto(0) do |k|
  if @parent[k][u] != @parent[k][v]
    u, v = @parent[k][u], @parent[k][v]
  end
end
@parent[0][u]

instance_methods.name: distance_between
instance_methods.doc: 頂点 $u$ と頂点 $v$ の距離を返します。
instance_methods.summary: 頂点 $u$ と頂点 $v$ の距離を返します。

instance_methods.name: on_path?
instance_methods.doc: 頂点 $u$ から頂点 $v$ までのパスに頂点 $a$ が含まれているか返します。
instance_methods.summary: 頂点 $u$ から頂点 $v$ までのパスに頂点 $a$ が含まれているか返します。
instance_methods.args_string: (u : Int, v : Int, a : Int) : Bool

constructors.name: new
constructors.doc:
配列 `array` に対して累積和を構築します。

```
array = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]
csum = StaticRangeSum(Int32).new(array)
```
constructors.summary: 配列 array に対して累積和を構築します。

instance_methods.name: get
instance_methods.doc:
$[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

```
array = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]
csum = StaticRangeSum(Int32).new(array)
csum.get(0...5) # => 1 + 1 + 2 + 3 + 5 = 12
```
instance_methods.summary: $[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

def.name: get
def.body:
if l <= r
else
  raise(IndexError.new("`l` must be less than or equal to `r` (#{l}, #{r})"))
end
@csum[r] - @csum[l]

instance_methods.name: get
instance_methods.doc:
$[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

```
array = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]
csum = StaticRangeSum(Int32).new(array)
csum.get(0...5) # => 1 + 1 + 2 + 3 + 5 = 12
```
instance_methods.summary: $[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。
instance_methods.args_html: (range : Range(Int | Nil, Int | Nil)) : T

def.name: get
def.body:
l = (range.begin || 0)
r = if range.end.nil?
  @size
else
  range.end.not_nil! + (range.exclusive? ? 0 : 1)
end
get(l, r)

instance_methods.name: get!
instance_methods.doc: $\sum_{i=1}^{r - 1} a_i - \sum_{i=1}^{l} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

instance_methods.name: get!
instance_methods.doc: $\sum_{i=1}^{r - 1} a_i - \sum_{i=1}^{l} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。
instance_methods.args_html: (range : Range(Int | Nil, Int | Nil)) : T

def.name: get!
def.body:
l = (range.begin || 0)
r = if range.end.nil?
  @size
else
  range.end.not_nil! + (range.exclusive? ? 0 : 1)
end
get!(l, r)

instance_methods.name: get?
instance_methods.doc:
$[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

$l \leq r$ を満たさないとき、`nil` を返します。

```
array = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]
csum = StaticRangeSum(Int32).new(array)
csum.get?(0...5) # => 1 + 1 + 2 + 3 + 5 = 12
csum.get?(7...5) # => nil
```
instance_methods.summary: $[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

def.name: get?
def.body:
if l <= r
else
  return nil
end
get(l, r)

instance_methods.name: get?
instance_methods.doc:
$[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。

$l \leq r$ を満たさないとき、`nil` を返します。

```
array = [1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13]
csum = StaticRangeSum(Int32).new(array)
csum.get?(0...5) # => 1 + 1 + 2 + 3 + 5 = 12
csum.get?(7...5) # => nil
```
instance_methods.summary: $[l, r)$ 番目までの要素の総和 $\sum_{i=l}^{r-1} a_i$ を $O(1)$ で返します。
instance_methods.args_string: (range : Range(Int | Nil, Int | Nil)) : T | Nil
instance_methods.args_html: (range : Range(Int | Nil, Int | Nil)) : T | Nil

def.name: get?
def.body:
l = (range.begin || 0)
r = if range.end.nil?
  @size
else
  range.end.not_nil! + (range.exclusive? ? 0 : 1)
end
get?(l, r)

def.name: new
def.body:
x = allocate
if x.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(x)
end
x
